Detailed Description

template<>
struct avro::codec_traits< std::pair< ValidSchema, GenericDatum > >

Specialization of codec_traits for Generic datum along with its schema.

This is maintained for compatibility with old code. Please use the cleaner codec_traits<GenericDatum> instead.
